verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5986>Amos,<s%> who was among the <S%H5349>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H8620>Tekoa,<s%> which he <S%H2372>saw<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> two <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake.<s%>

He <S%H559>said:<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7580>roar<s%> from <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H5414>utter<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> will <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> will <S%H3001>wither.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H702>yes,<s%> for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> its <S%H1758>punishment;<s%> because they have threshed <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with threshing <S%H2742>instruments<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%>
but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael,<s%> and it will <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of Ben <S%H1130>Hadad.<s%>

I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H1280>bar<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> from the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H206>Aven,<s%> and him who <S%H8551>holds<s%> the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> shall go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> to <S%H7024>Kir,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> <S%H702>yes,<s%> for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> its <S%H1540>punishment;<s%> because they carried away captive the <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H1546>community,<s%> to deliver them <S%H5462>up<s%> to <S%H123>Edom;<s%>
but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and it will <S%H398>devour<s%> its <S%H759>palaces.<s%>

I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> from <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and him who <S%H8551>holds<s%> the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> from <S%H831>Ashkelon;<s%> and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H6138>Ekron;<s%> and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> will <S%H6>perish,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> <S%H702>yes,<s%> for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> its <S%H5462>punishment;<s%> because they delivered up the <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H1546>community<s%> to <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H2142>didn't<s%> remember the <S%H251>brotherly<s%> <S%H1285>covenant;<s%>
but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and it will <S%H398>devour<s%> its <S%H759>palaces.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H702>yes,<s%> for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> its <S%H7291>punishment;<s%> because he pursued his <S%H251>brother<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and cast <S%H7843>off<s%> all <S%H7356>pity,<s%> and his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2963>raged<s%> <S%H5703>continually,<s%> and he <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H5678>wrath<s%> <S%H5331>forever;<s%>
but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> and it will <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H1224>Bozrah.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H702>yes,<s%> for four, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> its <S%H1234>punishment;<s%> because they have ripped open the <S%H2030>pregnant<s%> women of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> that they may <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> their <S%H1366>border.<s%>

But I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H7237>Rabbah,<s%> and it will <S%H398>devour<s%> its <S%H759>palaces,<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle,<s%> with a <S%H5591>storm<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H5492>whirlwind;<s%>
and their <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> he and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
